name: PJ's Jelicious Jam
description:
Searching for employees! 

We have opened a new "PJ´s Jelicious Jam" store to offer our tasty Jam
to every Jar in our sweet world. But we can´t handle the great demand.
We need your help to make every Jar as happy as possible and to turn
our store in a flourishing buisness. 

Let´s see if you can serve the jars perfectly and break the highscore
of the other employees (tell us in the comments) to be the employee
of the month!

Good luck to everyone!
The Management

-------------------------------------------

Credits:

This Game was created in 9 days for the 9th Kindred Game Jam with
the theme "Jam" by

Coding ~ Foxy (Foxel Games) 

Game Art ~ Lia (Foxel Games) 
                       ~ Sen (Foxel Games)

Musik ~ Hamish
